basics.name: Vedansh Kumar
basics.summary:
üöÄ Step into the realm of innovation, where I'm your vibrant developer armed with a robust skill set that spans Python, Unity (C#), IoT, Raspberry Pi, Arduino Uno, and the magical world of electronics. Picture this: a trail of successful AI projects showcasing classifiers, image detection marvels, and fraud detection wizardry. üåê

 But wait, there's more in my toolbox! I wield seamless API integration like a wizard casting spells, perform automation feats with the finesse of a magician using Beautiful Soup and Selenium, and manage databases (think MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Kafka) like a symphony conductor leading a masterpiece.

 Now, let's talk about the future where chatbots become conversational maestros. I'm your guide in this journey, well-versed in RASA and NLP, ready to bring your interactions to life. And guess what? I'm not just grounded; I'm floating in the clouds too! AWS, GCP, IBM I navigate through the cloud like a digital explorer. ü§ñ‚òÅÔ∏è

 Hold on, did I forget to mention my crown? Yep, I'm a game development hackathon champion, where creativity and technical brilliance come together for a spectacular show. üèÜ

 Feeling the spark yet? It's time to transform your ideas into reality. Let's collaborate, co-create, and conjure up something extraordinary! üöÄüí°
basics.headline: ### The Quieter you become , the more you'll be able to hear.

location.address: Home No 120 Block 11 Shahpuri gate, Sujanpur, near Grace beauty parlour, Mahajan hall

items.title: Xebia
items.content:
#### *Gurugram, India*
#### *Xebia is a worldwide, innovative IT Consultancy Company, operating on a global scale*
- Worked on blockchain projects
- Worked on creating Smart Contracts for Thought Machine
- Working on Kafka streaming, system design
- Worked on Spring Boot, Microservices, REST Framework
- Worked on MongoDB

items.title: Packt
items.content:
#### *Online U.S.A* 
- Designed an NLU chatbot using RASA for real-time COVID-19 updates, tailored for Indian data
##### *Achievements/Tasks*
- Leadership: Led a team of interns, fostering a collaborative environment and facilitating skill development.
- Project Management: Conducted daily stand-up meetings to track project progress and address any issues promptly.
- Delivery: Delivered the project on time, demonstrating effective project management and leadership skills.
- Recognition: Recognized for delivering the best project in the given timeframe, reflecting commitment and efficiency.

items.title: CIACON
items.content:
#### *Online Delhi, India*
- Spearheaded the development of a Capture The Flag (CTF) game for an international event that engaged ethical hackers globally.
- Leveraged Unity Engine and Photon Multiplayer to create a real-time and seamless gaming experience.
- Solo Developer

items.title: Variety Innovation
items.content:
#### *Gurugram, India*
- Executed tasks related to robotics and collaborative robots (cobots) within the company.
- Successfully programmed a robot for precision cutting, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in the manufacturing process.
- Worked extensively with 3D objects, applying Solidworks 3D for design and modeling.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate robotic solutions into various projects.

items.name: IchiBOt
items.summary:
- Acquired proficiency in AIML syntax through independent learning and self-directed study.
- Implemented AIML markup language effectively to ensure accurate and contextually relevant responses.
- Deployed on Telegram + self hosted server
items.description: Developed and deployed a versatile AIML-powered Chatbot, excelling in dynamic conversations on diverse subjects.

items.name: Indian Sign Language Interpreter
items.summary:
- Developed an innovative ISL (Indian Sign Language) interpreter utilizing machine learning techniques.
- Implemented Python, Tensorflow, and OpenCV to build a robust model for converting Sign Language to text and speech, and vice-versa.
- Successfully showcased the first prototype of the project at the prestigious Innovation Punjab Summit in 2019.

Skills
 -  Programming Languages: Python
 -  Machine Learning Frameworks: Tensorflow

Key Achievements
- Innovation Punjab Summit 2019 Showcase
  - Presented the initial prototype of the ISL Interpreter project at a prominent technology and innovation event.
  - Demonstrated the project's potential to bridge communication gaps for individuals using Indian Sign Language.
items.description: A Sign Language Interpreter for Mute or Deaf People

items.name: The Useless Game
items.summary:
Game Development | Unity
- Designed and developed "The Useless Game," a 2D mobile game using the Unity game engine.
- Served as a valuable learning and testing project, contributing to skill enhancement in game development.
- Gained hands-on experience in Unity's 2D game development features.

Key Achievements
- The Useless Game
  - Conceptualized and implemented a mobile game from ideation to deployment.
  - Demonstrated proficiency in Unity's 2D game development environment.
  - Acquired practical insights into game design principles and development workflows.

Skills
- Game Development: Unity
- Game Design 2D Game Development
- Mobile Platforms: Android
items.description: "Embark on a playful journey with 'The Useless Game,' an Android adventure blending simplicity with innovation, all crafted through the lens of a learning game development experience."
